entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PGO: libraries test failure on x64 linux #59973
    7.0.0
  • runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports missing #59972
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableArray[Slice] #59965
  • plugins fail to load for dotnet 6 single file - self contained app #59961
    6.0.0
  • JsonSerializer support for JsonDocument types in source generation mode #59954
    7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Regression: [JsonIgnore] Attribute not Applied to Ref Returns #59936
    6.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests - Maximum call stack size exceeded #59926
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Indexer to Vectors #59924
    7.0.0
  • JIT should optimize {array | span}.Length division by constant that is power of 2 #59922
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'GenTree::OperIsCommutative(oper)' during 'Generate code' #59916
    7.0.0

Closed

  • .NET Global Tools fail to launch of Apple Silicon #52335
    6.0.0
  • DependencyContextWriter.WritePortableTarget() does not write the duplicate key name when duplicate keys are detected #57649
    Future
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.SpanTests.FillNativeBytes #59444
    7.0.0
  • Published app silently crashes with: Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #59819
    6.0.0
  • SDK version of hostfxr.dll cannot initialize self-contained app #56968
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.Pipes.FifoReadWriteViaFileStream is hanging in CI #30155
    7.0.0
  • Unmatched transition callbacks in ICorProfilerCallback #59917
    7.0.0
  • SkipLocalsInit condition applies to NetCoreAppCurrent only #54964
    7.0.0
  • Debug stop working when I add some attributes in Blazor WebAssembly app #59950
  • Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName does not account for accessibility #57349
    6.0.0
  • [wasm] Regression. mono-aot-cross asserts with function:mono_method_to_ir, VAR 1 (TValue_REF) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #59739
  • [API Proposal]: Use value semantics for System.Collections.Immutable types #59901
  • Why is the Queryable.Min(selector) overload added in .NET 6 while it's semantically the same as Queryable.MinBy(keyselector) #59923
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b399444/b399444b/b399444b.sh #59794
    7.0.0
  • Should we mark MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod() and friends RequiresUnreferencedCode? #53242
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1402176 #59971
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix some of the issues around pgo data collection of stack trace data #59970
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] missing lint fixes #59969
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59968
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Fixes based on feedback for the original #59939 #59967
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1401985 #59966
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make bounds check nodes ordinary binary opers #59963
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement coreclr_create_delegate and move ComponentActivator to shared CoreLib #59962
    area-Interop-mono
  • Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep (#59106) #59960
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix byte array handling in STJ sourcegen #59957
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1401700 #59956
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions files after upgrading Package Validation logic #59955
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1401541 #59952
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59951
    area-System.Numerics
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1401389 #59943
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Seal internal types in runtime libs #59941
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1401232 #59938
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Seal internal types in runtime tasks #59935
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1401032 #59927
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1400956 #59921
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1400906 #59920
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1400835 #59915
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Fix code heap reservation size #59918
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix IDE0008 in DllImportGenerator and Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #59885
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Show dialog when running .NET 6 GUI single-file on 5.0 hostfxr #59929
    area-Single-File
  • Optimize division by constant after AND or RSZ #55778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • DependencyContextWriter.WritePortableTarget(): write the duplicate key name when duplicate keys are detected #57860
    area-DependencyModel, 7.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlWriterSettings #59467
    area-System.Xml
  • Don't try to build and archive/run libraries tests on official builds. #59953
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix genCodeForInitBlkUnroll for x86 #59873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix unmatched transition callback in JIT_ReversePInvokeExitTrackTransitions #59939
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix unmatched transition callback in JIT_ReversePInvokeExitTrackTransitions #59919
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not flush serializer buffers before first IAsyncEnumerable element is fetched #59865
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Enable doc generation for source-build #59937
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't regress SkipLocalsInit optimization on <= NET6 #59797
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update workload localization file directory structure #59827
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • [wasm] lint auto fix #59928
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Unix ARM64 RtlRestoreContext implementation #59849
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix JS debugger tests #59868
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] More typescript conversion #59655
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix code heap reservation size #59883
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Port workload description localization changes to main #59872
    area-System.Net
  • Annotate methods that get MethodBase from a stackwalk as RUC #59851
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Validate CompressionLevel in BrotliStream ctor #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Crossgen for FreeBSD, now that it is actually implemented. #59853
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #38162 #56860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update HostFactoryResolver to account for lack of application name with new host pattern #59743
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #59767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add back the nethost archive. #59847
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, needs author feedback, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix license header in a few new files #59910
    area-Meta
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, needs author feedback, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs author feedback, community-contribution
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs conform to interop guidelines #59913
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Print "callsites by likely classes" chart in 'dotnet-pgo dump' command #59306
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix a macro usage and cleanup stale comment #59907
    community-contribution
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] SignalR MessagePackHubProtocol #1625
  • Unresolved external symbol wmainCRTStartup #1623
  • Optimize symbolic regex Antimirov mode to avoid so much allocation #1622
  • Factor FindFirstChar SIMD optimizations into NonBacktracking engine #1621
  • Make AOT compiler work with VS 2022 #1618

Closed

  • cleanup namespaces and folder structure of new regex engine #1534
  • Move SRM regex DGML code to be DEBUG only #1539

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add support for returning ref types (in ShadowStack spill slot) #1627
  • Fixed omitted NonBacktracking option in Match test code #1626
  • Add VS2022 detection #1624
    area-NativeAOT
  • Swallow any exceptions out of module initializer #1620
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Update issues.targets #1619
    area-NativeAOT
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add SSA form #1598
  • detect and throw NotSupported for balancing capture group #1613
  • Use newly added rooting mechanism in CoreCLR tests #1614
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • FreeBSD build #1607
  • Fix and update replace for NonBackTracking #1616

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Command line build fails but works in Visual Studio #21715
  • Add ability to install custom workload manifests as nuget packages. #21708

Closed

  • Workload command line structure #16267
    6.0.1xx
  • Consider caching in ResolveTargetingPackAssets #19282
  • Global default using statements #21724
  • dotnet publish produces code that fails with System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly Newtonsoft.Json, Version=11.0.0.0 #21716

PullRequests

Created

  • Use TFM in dotnet.*.js file name #21740
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1402474 #21738
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1402324 #21736
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Merge 6.0.1xx-rc2 to main #21662
    Area-Workloads
  • Merge 6.0.1xx-rc2 to 6.0.1xx #21661
    Area-Workloads
  • Make aspnet-browser-refresh.js tolerate duplication insertions #21429
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "and, or, and not patterns" (VS 16.8, .NET 5) #1350
    9.0
  • [DoesNotReturn] warning is only reported in nullable-enabled context #5231
  • Champion: verbatim interpolated string (order of $@ vs. @$) (16.3, Core 3) #1630
    8.0
  • Feature propsoal: Allow use of override keyword on interface method implementations. #3510

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add pattern-variables.md #4592

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Annotate `SyntaxNode.CopyAnnotationsTo()` with `NotNullIfNotNull`? #56949
  • VBCSCompiler eagerly depends on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.dll (when when no VB compiled) #56945
  • RenameSymbolAsync doesn't rename delegate references resulting in compilation errors in the code after a rename #56940
  • 'Remove unnecessary cast' cases we could support in the future. #56938

Closed

  • Roslyn fails to verify nullable attributes on lambda expressions in delegate conversions #55649
    17.1
  • Assignment of lambda to delegate fails for value type with generic NRT #47167
    17.1
  • Check nullability attributes in conversions of lambdas #56668
    17.1
  • Provide a compiler level API to list used (or the opposite unused) references per compilation #37768
    Compiler.Next
  • Source Generators: Produce single NuGet package that includes net5.0 library + Source Generator #55229
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable roll-forward to newer SDK versions #56950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56948
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add SolutionSessionId #56947
    Area-Interactive
  • Create DiagnosticSuppressorDesign.md #56944
    Area-Analyzers
  • Update PublishData.json #56943
    Area-Infrastructure
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only

Merged

  • Disallow 'var' as an explicit lambda expression return type #56911
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Analysis of attributes in conversions of lambdas #56792
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56942
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • CompletionService: remove public constructor #56896
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Add external access for vscode telemetry #56894
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • Don't break if we fork a snapshot after freezing partial semantics #56890
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Delete ImmutableHashMap #31408
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Update support for finding CodeLens references from source generated files #53043
    Area-IDE
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Annotate completion providers #56937
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIsOperator - store `ConversionKind` instead of `Conversion` #56922
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • [DNM] Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Move to a singleton storage service per process, instead of per workspace. #56916
    Area-IDE
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify code for pragma placements #56285
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using FromRouteAttribute's Name property with minimal routes is broken #37268
  • asp-validation-for does not insert a message between spans when using BindPropertyAttribute.Name #37266
  • Blazor: Cannot use style encapsulation does not work without a base element. #37262
  • Shrink blazor.*.js file size, SignalR Minification #37260
  • Error about "dynamic culture change while sharding ICU data" no longer always appears in 6.0 #37258
    Backlog
  • Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName does not account for accessibility #37257
  • Strange dotnet.*.js versioning when targeting net5.0 with 6.0 SDK #37256
    6.0.0
  • HeadOutlet not working when using WebAssembly and Serverside Pre Render. #37254
  • can you add a new component to body/div in Blazor ? #37253
  • Overload for Redirect that takes a Uri #37246

Closed

  • CS1061 incorrectly identifies File with typo #17841
    Razor.Tooling
  • Issue with replacing IObjectModelValidator #30938
    6.0.0
  • How to get Physical Path for virtual path in .NET 6 RC1? #37008
  • System.Globalization - RegionInfo.CurrentRegion #37235
  • Re-enable Build_ExplicitCSharp8_NullableEnforcement_WarningsDuringBuild_BuildServer test #13930
    Razor.Tooling
  • Visual studio 2019 using too much CPU #14590
    Razor.Tooling
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.AzureAppServices.HostingStartup Assembly not found #37255
  • Fallback logic for TryParse and BindAsync is inconsistent #36957
    6.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly App with Individual Accounts and ASP.NET Core Hosted - IdentityServer - Key Type File - Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReaderException: 'Unexpected character encountered while parsing number #37244
    Backlog
  • Blazor HeadContent need to use with ServerPrerendered #37216
    6.0.0
  • Blazor Server custom auth without Identity #37249
  • Blazor WebAssembly App with Individual Accounts and ASP.NET Core Hosted - Object reference not set to an instance of an object - AddSigningCredentials #37239
  • .Net 6 RC1 - Cannot set reponse headers in ExceptionMiddleware returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #36977
    6.0.0
  • Validate state of Blazor with RC2 bits #36471
    6.0-rc2
  • AuthorizationMessageHandler fails to set authenticationstate on error #30927
    6.0.0
  • [Hot Reload] Source Generator Based Error Breaks Hot Reload #36825
    6.0.0
  • DateOnly passing to JSRuntime no longer supported in Blazor 6.0.0-rc.1 #36631
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Virtualize is very inefficient if you've already scrolled way beyond the end of the dataset #37245
    6.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SecretManager.Tools.Tests.SecretManagerTests.SetSecrets #21413
    7.0-preview1
  • Unskip UserSecret tests #25109
    7.0-preview1
  • .NET 6, RC1: Get localization working #36729
    6.0.0
  • Blazor VirtualScroll throwing exception when used with double-bound field and @key keyword #27382
    6.0.0
  • Disposing InputFile BrowserFileStream does not dispose JSStreamReference #35540
    6.0.0
  • .NET 6 RC 1 ASP.NET Core Blazor Microsoft Identity Libraries Errors when Published #37217
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #36964
  • Startup improvement: updates #37174
  • Startup improvement: endpoint, mapaction, mapaction #37223
  • Startup improvement: json #37237
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #37085
  • Perf improvement: single_query #37236

PullRequests

Created

  • Honor FromRoute parameter name when specified #37271
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Try test on CI #37270
    area-runtime
  • Update GitHub Issue Templates #37267
    area-blazor
  • Added nullable overload for markupString #37265
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support EndpointGroupName metadata in MVC ApiExplorer #37264
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix virtualization handling of large dataset length changes. Fixes #37245 #37250
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Release JS Blob after BrowserFileStream is disposed. Fixes #35540 #37248
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Remove trace interfaces from Kestrel transports #37243
    area-runtime
  • Remove IKestrelTrace #37242
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Cleanup YAML jobs #37231
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add additional types to SuppressChildValidationMetadataProvider (#37150) #37188
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • Suggested fix for Issue #37240 - Update documentation for the changes I needed to install Java using the scripts #37241
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use Authorization header in WebSockets on Node #37205
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Add source-index build job to pipeline #37028
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix ambiguous BindAsync error #37185
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.0
  • Fix ambiguous BindAsync error #37142
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `55da9ce` to `9251ef4` #37251
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e4717df` to `3b49be0` #37252
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Normalize the content root and improve errors (#36990) #37226
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update selenium-standalone #37184
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix virtualization handling of large dataset length changes. Fixes #37245 #37247
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Un-skip SetSecrets #37101
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-preview1
  • Release JS Blob after BrowserFileStream is disposed. Fixes #35540 #37004
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update Selenium dependencies #37183
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Honoring error information on OAuth Exchange Code #37224
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Don't allow modifying WebRootPath after initialization #37147
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21480.20 #37192
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Try out helix retry #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed translation error: "disable OpenApi support" issue #37202 #37220
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37040
    area-runtime
  • [main] [release/6.0] Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #36397
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mix AsSingleQuery / AsSplitQuery #26244

Closed

  • Owned entity not loaded if PK has a value converter #26116
    6.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException on retrieval of a pooled DbContext #26202

    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.4 #26248
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 7.5.8 to 8.0.3 #26246

Merged

Updated

    blocked
  • [6.0] Mark internal the ValueConverter constructors that allow conversion of nulls #26232
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.0
